job_tasks.justification: Indicates direct participation in software development activities.
The phrase signifies hands-on development work.

job_tasks.phrase: architectuur en ontwikkeling van zowel de backend en frontend van onze webapplicatie Carto
job_tasks.justification: Covers the design (architecture) and creation (development) of both backend and frontend components of a web application.

job_tasks.phrase: Je werkt nauw met hen samen en plant en coördineert het gezamenlijke ontwikkelwerk
job_tasks.justification: Describes coordination and planning of development efforts with external partners.

job_tasks.phrase: zorgen dat onze AI zo goed mogelijk ontsloten wordt via Carto aan gebruikers
job_tasks.justification: Implies integrating and enabling access to AI capabilities, which often involves understanding and working with models, even if not directly building them from scratch.

job_tasks.phrase: het bepalen van de technische richting en architectuur van Carto, waarbij je rekening houdt met performance, security, cloud compute kosten en de wensen van onze gebruikers
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on the strategic technical planning and design of the application, considering various non-functional requirements.

job_tasks.phrase: ontwikkelt en implementeert de backend-functionaliteit van nieuwe features in Python
job_tasks.justification: Directly states development and implementation of backend features using a specific programming language.
Directly states development of frontend functionality using a specific programming language.

job_tasks.phrase: schrijft gestructureerde, herbruikbare en efficiënte code
job_tasks.justification: Describes core principles of good software development practice.
Involves ensuring the quality of the code, a standard software development practice.

job_tasks.phrase: stelt technische specificaties en user stories op in samenwerking met het team
job_tasks.justification: Relates to the planning and documentation phase of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: plant het werk voor het full-stack team, inclusief partners
job_tasks.justification: Involves project management and task planning for a development team.

job_tasks.phrase: denkt mee met Spheers founders over de technische roadmap en toekomst van Carto voor meer jaren
job_tasks.justification: Indicates strategic thinking and alignment with business goals regarding the product's future.

job_tasks.phrase: begeleidt junioren in hun technische ontwikkeling, onder andere door pair-programming
job_tasks.justification: Mentoring and guiding junior developers in their technical growth is part of team leadership in software development.

classification.rationale: This role heavily emphasizes full-stack software development, architecture, team leadership, and business alignment, with a secondary mention of making AI accessible. There's no direct evidence of core ML Engineer tasks like algorithm development, data preprocessing, or model training/validation.
